#summary CAN - Controller Area Network

= Introduction =

This page covers the CAN module.

= Dependency =

  * XTAL module in order to get clock source frequency.

= Supported devices =

*Some devices require modification to the headers since avr-libc 1.7.0 still have errors in them.*
